text: Allah ni Ajula jwaagumbile mawunde nsano nagaŵili, nombe nalyo litaka yalumope (mataka nsano nagaŵili). Malamusi gakuŵa gali nkutuluka chilikati chakwe (cha mawunde ni mataka) kuti mmanyilile ŵanganyammwe yanti Allah pa chindu chilichose aŵele Jwakombola kusyene, ni yanti Allah amasile paachisyungwile chindu chilichose ni umanyilisi (waachimanya chenene)
